name: Internet of Things DC Inaugural Meetup
tagline: Presentations from the August 27, 2013 meetup of Internet of Things DC.
body:
### The inaugural meetup of Internet of Things DC was held on August 27, 2013 at 1776 in Washington DC.

***

### Event details, attendee comments, photos from the event:

* [Event page on Meetup.com](http://www.meetup.com/Internet-of-Things-DC/events/124299872/)

### Presentations:

* [Agenda & Topics - Greg Toth, IoT DC](1-Event_Title_Slide.pdf)
* [Internet of Things DC:  Purpose & Vision - Greg Toth, IoT DC](2-IoT_DC_Intro_Deck_Aug_27.pdf)
* [Creativity and the Internet of Things - Brendan Robinson, Deconstruction](4-Deconstruction.pdf)
* [From Lettuce to Warheads - Brian Nordmann, U.S. Department of State](5-From_Lettuce_to_Warheads.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
